title: Adele Performance Opens the 2017 Grammy Awards – Watch Adele Grammys Opening Act
text:
After a red carpet full of chic celebrity style, Adele kicked things off at Grammy Awards with an epic performance of her hit song "Hello." The singer, who was nominated for five awards this year, including album of the year for 25 , wore a stunning dress with sequined embellishment on the bodice and a flowing black skirt.
